title: Attachment Pane
content: An update after July 1 has caused the attachment pane to disappear from the displayed emails. If I click on an email received after 1 July with the paperclip icon, no attachment pane shows at the bottom of the email. When I move to the next email in the list, the attachment pane very briefly flashes then disappears. This also happens when I move an email with a working attachment pane to another folder or sub-folder.
creator: neillb46

title: missing frame
content: There is a part where the main window frame is cut off in the upper left corner.
creator: kamiyama.ransho

title: messages
content: Read messages are not displaying only new messages. Turning the filter on and off does not change anything.
creator: fancyer

title: Syncing Thunderbird across devices
content: Does anybody know if there are plans to give TBird the ability to sync across various devices like we can with Firefox and Outlook? If so , any idea of a timetable/ Thanks Chris
creator: chris119
